title: style chicken casserole
description: Make a double batch of Nigel's tasty chicken casserole - eat some and freeze the rest. See the top recipe tip below for advice on freezing.
ingredients: 2-3 large, juicy garlic cloves, peeled, roughly chopped
6 large chicken thighs, bone in and skin on
1 lemon, cut in half, thinly sliced
small handful fresh coriander, roughly chopped
